title: Test Your Understanding
body: Explore the scenario below, then answer the question on the subsequent pane.
instruction: Explore the scenario below, then answer the question on the subsequent pane.

_items.title: Fiona
_items.body:
Fiona is an accounting lead for the 3D Print business.

She recently reported an accounting error that she noticed in her team's year-end reports. This error resulted in several hundred thousand dollars of inaccurately recorded revenue that resulted led to in an audit of her team.

_items.title: Jane
_items.body: Since Fiona reported this issue to her manager, Jane, she noticed that she has not been included in certain team meetings and project status discussions. Fiona no longer feels like a valued member of the team.
